content.theme: Pain is fuel. Scars are power. The closer to death, the more dangerous you become.
content.design: Fury augments reward taking damage and surviving â€” not avoiding it.

content.title: Entry
content.budget: Minor bonuses. Conditional combat edges. Small survivability bumps.

augments.name: Adrenal Injector
augments.effect: First scar per mission: 0% death chance

augments.name: Iron Stomach
augments.effect: +2 to Grit checks for toxicity resistance

content.title: Adapted
content.budget: Conditional combat bonuses. HP bumps. Scar interaction begins.

augments.name: Overclocked Adrenals
augments.effect: +2 accuracy all melee. +1 auto-Scar per mission (trade-off)

content.title: Integrated
content.budget: Multiplicative Scar bonuses. Kill triggers. Death-defying mechanics.

augments.name: Blood Frenzy
augments.effect: On kill, next attack gains +2 accuracy

augments.name: Death Grip
augments.effect: At 0 HP, make one melee attack before Scar roll

augments.name: Berserker's Howl
augments.effect: 1/combat: enemies targeting you take -1 accuracy for 2 rounds

augments.name: Unkillable
augments.effect: Failed death roll â†’ survive at 1 HP. Permanent -1 stat (trade-off)

augments.name: Avatar of Pain
augments.effect: While at 1+ Scars: +2 all melee damage dice, immune to fear/morale effects, cannot be knocked prone
